DOC.brief_summary: This is a field trial of the Unicirc instrument to excise the foreskin, plus use of cyanoacrylate tissue adhesive to seal the wound.
DOC.brief_title: Phase 4 Field Trial of the Unicirc Instrument With Tissue Adhesive
DOC.criteria: Men at least 18 years of age Poor general health Anatomical abnormalities that would complicate circumcision Bleeding disorder Ongoing infection Cannot attend followup visits
